resources.string: Here, in addition to the role "Administrator", you can authorize additional roles for access to the "Preferences" module.
- The menu item cannot be deleted because access roles still exist.\n
Access to the Birthday List plugin
Members of this role have access to the Birthday List plugin
By default, the age or the anniversary is displayed in front of the additional text always. If this display should be suppressed, the checkbox has to be selected.
The bearing is here will appear in the display selection menu \"Configuration selection ...\".
Date of test is the date field used for the calculations (Either a profile field of type 'Date' or choosing a role, the beginning of role membership)

The specified text is appended to the age or anniversary. "th birthday on the #Day#.#Month#" could, for example, are displayed as "30th birthday on the 10.02.".

Placeholder:
#Day# = Day
#Month# = Month
#Year# = Year

About values can be filtered to specific values. 30,40,50 means eg that only 30th, 40th or 50th birthdays or anniversaries are displayed. Individual values can also be defined as a range specification \"from-to;step size\" (example: 30-50;10 results in 30,40,50). Should not be filtered, the field should be left blank.
Here the columns are selected to be displayed in the list.
The respective checkbox has to be activated if you want to use the name of the configuration as a heading.

Example:
Name: Round birthday
Date of test: Birthday
Values: 30,40,50,60,70,80 or 30-80;10 (If no filtering is required, the field should be left blank)
Additional text: th birthday on the #Month#.#Day#.

Here any number of configurations can be created for the birthday and anniversary list. In the display of the birthday list one of these configurations is selected using "Configuration selection..." as the basis for the presentation.
created with the plugin birthday list of the online member management Admidio
Allows the documentation of the plugin can be opened (An existing Internet connection is required because the data is located on admidio.org).

For iCal export at least the following profile fields must be available in the list:

- Date of birth and
- First name or last name

and

"Age or anniversary not show" must not be set in the configuration.
The authorization check of the plugin failed. There is more than one menu item with the same URL defined.\n\n=> #VAR1_BOLD#

Here, the text can be customized and added to an e-mail. Texts have two paragraphs (subject & content) which are identified by titles like #subject# and #content#. Content parts follow after this titles. Each message can have free space for current messages.

IMPORTANT: To send an e-mail, the the profile field Email has to be displayed in a column.

Placeholder:
#user_first_name# = First name of the member
#user_last_name# = Last name of the member
#organization_long_name# = Name of the organization
#config# = Text of the last column (configurations-column)

#subject# Congratulations
#content# Dear Member,

on your #config# we will send you best wishes.

With best regards
#organization_long_name#
The values for the preview list (Multiple entries must be separated by commas; e.g.: -10,-1,0,1,2,10,20,30,365,1000)
To display the data of a spouse, the relationship "spouse" can be selected here. After saving and updating the page, there are additional choices for this relationship in the column selection.
By default, the current date is used. If the database is supposed to start January 1st of the current year, the checkbox has to be selected.
Here you can select a template from the adm_my_files/mail_templates admidio folder.
Only roles (=access roles) that were created by the plugin during setup will be removed.
- An error occurred while deleting access roles. Not all access roles could be deleted.\n
- The access roles created by the plugin have been deleted.\n
- An error occurred while deleting the configuration data.\n
- The configuration data created by the plugin has been deleted.\n
The menu item will only be removed if all access roles created by the plugin (including in other organizations) have been deleted beforehand.
- An error occurred while deleting the menu item.\n
- The menu item created by the plugin has been deleted.\n
- The table "adm_plugin_preferences" could not be deleted because it houses more data from other plugins.\n
Entries created by the plugin can be deleted via uninstallation.
This display can be shifted forward or backward for x years (0 corresponds to no offset).
